steps.title: Create Infiltration Event
steps.content: Click to add an infiltration event. (You can use the ← and → arrow keys to navigate the Tour!)

tour-event.name: The Hag's Secret
tour-event.premise: Finally. You've come upon the swamp hag's abode within Heretic Swamp. The inside and surrounding area may just provide some insight into the curse that's befallen the village..
